about_the_game:
Ghetto Zombies is an intense pixel art action shooter where you take control of different heroes from an elite squad to face hordes of zombies and eccentric creatures. Armed to the teeth with quirky weapons — like ketchup pistols, bubble gum launchers, and water guns — you'll explore a chaotic city, showcase your art with graffiti, defeat challenging bosses, and hunt for the cure to the epidemic!

🌆 From Apocalypse to Graffiti

From the beaches to the city center, each setting is packed with unpredictable hordes and creative dangers. Between battles, leave your mark on the world with the graffiti system, transforming every neighborhood into your personal gallery of survival art.

🧟 Face the Undead

Zombies come in all shapes and sizes, each more bizarre and dangerous than the last. At the end of every sequence, confront Carne Seca, the mastermind villain who returns in new forms and with unique abilities to test your courage and tactics.

💥 Logic-Defying Weapons

With an arsenal as crazy as it is fun, choose between traditional weapons and revolutionary ones. Each weapon offers unique combat styles and guaranteed surprises.

🔬 Mission for the Cure

With the help of Professor Vara, a scientist capybara, you’re not just fighting to survive but also working to reverse the zombie apocalypse. Collect samples from zombies, defeat bosses, and get closer to the ultimate solution to save humanity.

🌟 Stylish Chaos

Dive into charismatic animations, vibrant pixel art, and an engaging soundtrack as you battle in a game that blends intense action with moments of pure fun and creativity.

Get ready to shoot, graffiti, and survive in Ghetto Zombies, where chaos has never been this much fun!

short_description: Ghetto Zombies is a colorfull pixel art shooter where the ghetto are the last hope against the zombies. In this humorous apocalypse, graffiti the city and use your crazy guns to defeat fun freaky-zombies hordes!
